channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- postgresql
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- postgresql

item.title: CVE-2018-1115|2024-08-05T03:51:48.772Z -- unspecified -- postgresql
item.description: postgresql before versions 10.4, 9.6.9 is vulnerable in the adminpack extension, the pg_catalog.pg_logfile_rotate() function doesn't follow the same ACLs than pg_rorate_logfile. If the adminpack is added to a database, an attacker able to connect to it could exploit this to force log rotation.
